venue.address_2: Back Bay across from Hynes Convention Center
venue.name: McGreevyâ€™s

item.description:
Yava invites you to "Major League Rendezvous", a Networking Event on Tuesday October 26 from 7:00 pm -9:30 pm at McGreevys Sports Bar in the Back Bay.

Yava is a Boston-based non-profit organization looking for volunteers. For more info go to www.yavaonline.org.

RSVP with us and at www.eventbrite.com/event/879894789

This event will take place in the VIP room with complimentary hors d'oeuvres and cash bar.

Dress Code is Business Casual.

Cuisine style is Irish-American.

Major Credit Cards are accepted.

Event is 21 Plus with ID.

MBTA stops Prudential or Hynes on the Green Line.

As the Irish say "a drink precedes a story" so come out and share one with Yava, watch the game and network at America's First Sports Bar.
item.name: Major League Rendezvous Networking Event at McGreevys
